sources.llm_summary: 1990-2025. Current account balance as a proportion of GDP (%), Portfolio investment, net (Balance of Payments, current United States dollars), Foreign direct investment, net inflows, as a proportion of GDP (%), Volume of remittances (in United States dollars) as a proportion of total GDP (%), Amount of tracked exported Environmentally Sound Technologies (current United States dollars).
19,132 earthquake events magnitude 5.0+ worldwide, 2015-2025. Includes depth, felt radius, and impact data where available.

sources.source_name: Global Flood Database + Dartmouth Flood Observatory
sources.llm_summary: 610 flood events worldwide, 2015-2019. Includes flood extent, duration, severity, deaths, and displacement data. Source data ends in 2019.
1,177 tropical storms/hurricanes/typhoons worldwide, 2015-2025. Includes track positions with wind speed, pressure, and wind radii data.
17,338 tornado events in USA and Canada, 2015-2025. Includes EF-scale ratings, track endpoints, path width, and damage data.

sources.source_name: NOAA NCEI Global Historical Tsunami Database
sources.llm_summary: 193 tsunami events worldwide, 2015-2025. Includes triggering earthquake magnitude, water height, and intensity data.

sources.source_name: Smithsonian Global Volcanism Program + NOAA Significant Eruptions
sources.llm_summary: 383 volcanic eruption events worldwide, 2015-2025. Includes VEI ratings, eruption agents, and impact data from NOAA significant eruptions.
11,235 wildfire events 200+ km2 worldwide (excluding USA/Canada), 2001-2024. Derived from MODIS burned area product.
